verses.text: On that \w night|strong="H3915"\w* could \w not|strong="H5074"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w*, and he \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* to \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of \w records|strong="H2146"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w*; and they were \w read|strong="H7121"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.\f + \fr 6.1 \ft could…: Heb. the king’s sleep fled away\f*

And it was \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w*, that \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* had \w told|strong="H5046"\w* of \w Bigthana|strong="H0904"\w* and \w Teresh|strong="H8657"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w chamberlains|strong="H5631"\w*, the \w keepers|strong="H8104"\w* of the \w door|strong="H5592"\w*, who \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* to \w lay|strong="H7971"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* on the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ahasuerus|strong="H0325"\w*.\f + \fr 6.2 \ft Bigthana: also called, Bigthan\f*\f + \fr 6.2 \ft door: Heb. threshold\f*

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, What \w honour|strong="H3366"\w* and \w dignity|strong="H1420"\w* hath been \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* for this? Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w servants|strong="H5288"\w* that \w ministered|strong="H8334"\w* unto him, There is \w nothing|strong="H1697"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* for him.

¶ And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Who \add is\add* in the \w court|strong="H2691"\w*? Now \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* was \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w outward|strong="H2435"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, to \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* to \w hang|strong="H8518"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* on the \w gallows|strong="H6086"\w* that he had \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* for him.

And the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w servants|strong="H5288"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Behold, \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w standeth|strong="H5975"\w* in the \w court|strong="H2691"\w*. And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Let him come \w in|strong="H0935"\w*.

So \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* came \w in|strong="H0935"\w*. And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, What shall be \w done|strong="H6213"\w* unto the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* whom the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w delighteth|strong="H2654"\w* to \w honour|strong="H3366"\w*? Now \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w thought|strong="H0559"\w* in his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, To whom would the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w delight|strong="H2654"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w honour|strong="H3366"\w* \w more|strong="H3148"\w* than to myself?\f + \fr 6.6 \ft whom the king…: Heb. in whose honour the king delighteth\f*

And \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, For the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* whom the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w delighteth|strong="H2654"\w* to \w honour|strong="H3366"\w*,\f + \fr 6.7 \ft whom the king…: Heb. in whose honour the king delighteth\f*

Let the \w royal|strong="H4438"\w* \w apparel|strong="H3830"\w* be \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* which the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \add useth\add* to \w wear|strong="H3847"\w*, and the \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* that the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w rideth|strong="H7392"\w* upon, and the \w crown|strong="H3804"\w* \w royal|strong="H4438"\w* which is \w set|strong="H5414"\w* upon his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*:\f + \fr 6.8 \ft Let…: Heb. Let them bring the royal apparel\f*\f + \fr 6.8 \ft which the king…: Heb. wherewith the king clotheth himself\f*

And let this \w apparel|strong="H3830"\w* and \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* be \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* to the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w one|strong="H0376"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* most \w noble|strong="H6579"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, that they may \w array|strong="H3847"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add withal\add* whom the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w delighteth|strong="H2654"\w* to \w honour|strong="H3366"\w*, and \w bring|strong="H7392"\w* him on \w horseback|strong="H5483"\w* through the \w street|strong="H7339"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him, Thus shall it be \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* whom the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w delighteth|strong="H2654"\w* to \w honour|strong="H3366"\w*.\f + \fr 6.9 \ft bring…: Heb. cause him to ride\f*

Then the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w*, Make \w haste|strong="H4116"\w*, \add and\add* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w apparel|strong="H3830"\w* and the \w horse|strong="H5483"\w*, as thou hast \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* even so to \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* the \w Jew|strong="H3064"\w*, that \w sitteth|strong="H3427"\w* at the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*: let \w nothing|strong="H1697"\w* \w fail|strong="H5307"\w* of all that thou hast \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*.\f + \fr 6.10 \ft let…: Heb. suffer not a whit to fall\f*

Then \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* the \w apparel|strong="H3830"\w* and the \w horse|strong="H5483"\w*, and \w arrayed|strong="H3847"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w*, and brought him on \w horseback|strong="H7392"\w* through the \w street|strong="H7339"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w proclaimed|strong="H7121"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him, Thus shall it be \w done|strong="H6213"\w* unto the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* whom the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w delighteth|strong="H2654"\w* to \w honour|strong="H3366"\w*.

¶ And \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* came \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*. But \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w hasted|strong="H1765"\w* to his \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w mourning|strong="H0057"\w*, and having his \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w covered|strong="H2645"\w*.

And \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w told|strong="H5608"\w* \w Zeresh|strong="H2238"\w* his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* and all his \w friends|strong="H0157"\w* every \add thing\add* that had \w befallen|strong="H7136"\w* him. Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* his wise \w men|strong="H2450"\w* and \w Zeresh|strong="H2238"\w* his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* unto him, If \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \add be\add* of the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* whom thou hast \w begun|strong="H2490"\w* to \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*, thou shalt not \w prevail|strong="H3201"\w* against him, but shalt \w surely|strong="H5307"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him.

And while they \add were\add* yet \w talking|strong="H1696"\w* with him, \w came|strong="H5060"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w chamberlains|strong="H5631"\w*, and \w hasted|strong="H0926"\w* to \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* unto the \w banquet|strong="H4960"\w* that \w Esther|strong="H0635"\w* had \w prepared|strong="H6213"\w*.
